info.name: Distributor Management API
info.description:
## Welcome to Distributor Management documentation

This is a simple API of the Distributor Management application.  
Below you will find all our endpoints available so far.  
  
All endpoints require authentication except the endpoinst:

- Generate a token
- Login
- Register
    

#### All requests use the following variables:

The variables below are just examples, for the real use of the API it will be necessary to use variables according to your environment.

- `{{url}} = http://mydomain.com`
- `{{token}} = eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ1c2VySWQdsfrhtbgfbsrt5`
    

#### Contats for support:

- Complete project: [Github](https://github.com/joaopiccini/Distributor-Product-Management)
- E-mail: [joaopedropiccini@gmail.com](mailto:joaopedropiccini@gmail.com)

item.name: Authentication

request.description: This request generates the authorization token to perform the other requests.
This request authorizes a user to enter in the distributor.

item.description: In the authentication folder there are the endpoints to generate the authorization token and autenticate the users.

item.name: Users

request.description: This request finds all customers registered at the distributor.
This request finds all customers registered at the distributor.
This request creates a new user at the distributor.
This request updates the status of an existing user to inactive at the distributor.
This request updates the status of an existing user to active at the distributor.

item.description: In the users folder there are endpoints to search, register and update the users registered in the distributor.

request.description: This request finds a customer registered at the distributor.
This request finds a customer registered at the distributor.
This request registers a new customer at the distributor.
This request updates an existing customer at the distributor.
This request updates the status of an existing customer to inactive at the distributor.
This request updates the status of an existing customer to active at the distributor.

item.description: In the customers folder there are endpoints to search, register and update the customers registered in the distributor.

item.name: Products

request.description:
StartFragment

This request finds all products registered at the distributor.
This request finds a product registered at the distributor.
This request finds all products of the specified type.
This request registers a new product at the distributor.
This request updates an existing product at the distributor.
This request deletes an existing product at the distributor.

item.description: In the products folder there are endpoints to search, register, update and delete the products registered in the distributor.

request.description: This request registers a new request at the distributor.
This request updates an existing request at the distributor.
This request updates the status of an existing request to completed at the distributor.
This request updates the status of an existing request to canceled at the distributor.
This request deletes an existing request at the distributor.

item.description: In the requests folder there are endpoints to search, register, update and delete the requests registered in the distributor.

request.description: This request fills the distributor's database with false data.
